description:
Sonarr is a PVR for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new episodes of your favorite shows and will grab, sort and rename them.


Changes
- Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in #6846
- Fix SDR Files Being Parsed As HLG by @yammes08 in #6842
- New: Genres and Images for Webhooks and Notifiarr by @markus101 in #6839
- Fixed: Include full series title in episode search by @markus101 in #6844
- Fixed: Manual Interaction Required with possible null series by @mynameisbogdan in #6850
- Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in #6853
- New: Refresh cache for tracked queue on series add by @mynameisbogdan in #6849
- Fixed: Ignore case for name validation in providers by @mynameisbogdan in #6857
- Fixed: Skip invalid series paths during validation by @markus101 in #6855
- Fixed: Improve error messaging if config file isn't formatted correctly by @markus101 in #6863
- Ignore Grabbed from API docs by @mynameisbogdan in #6869
- New: Add TMDB id support by @sundermann in #6867
- Fixed: Adding series with unknown items in queue by @markus101 in #6874
- Fixed: Importing from IMDb list by @markus101 in #6877
- New: Ignore inaccessible folders with getting folders by @mynameisbogdan in #6879
- New: Display stats for delete multiple series modal by @mynameisbogdan in #6880
- Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in #6891
- New: Parse anime seasons with trailing number in title by @markus101 in #6888
- New: Improve UI status when downloads cannot be imported automatically by @markus101 in #6889
- Fixed: Exclude invalid releases from Newznab and Torznab parsers by @mynameisbogdan in #6892
- New: Ability to select Plex Media Server from plex.tv by @markus101 in #6893
- New: Ignore Deluge torrents without a title by @markus101 in #6894
- Fixed: Prevent errors parsing releases in unexpected formats by @markus101 in #6897
- Fixed: Reprocessing items that were previously blocked during importing by @markus101 in #6907
- Fixed: Limit Queue maximum page size to 200 by @markus101 in #6904
- Fixed: Don't use cleaned up release title for release title by @markus101 in #6911
- Remove seriesTitle from EpisodeResource by @markus101 in #6912
- Fixed: Use only trackable downloads in queue by @mynameisbogdan in #6919
- Disable trim log database housekeeping task by @mynameisbogdan in #6920
- Translations update from Servarr Weblate by @ServarrAdmin in #6916
- Bump version to 4.0.6 by @markus101 in #6921
